name: CoinOP - A Small RPG Where Magic is Money!
name_original: CoinOP - A Small RPG Where Magic is Money!
description:
Based on the 2017 GMTK Game Jam tag (dual-purpose design), CoinOP is a quick RPG romp where magic comes with a price - 25 cents!

You play as Ark, a rad dude who uses powers to take care of baddies while making your way to the Rad God. Only catch? Your power comes with a price, and it's money! Sell the equipment you receive to earn money, or hoard and unleash powerful attacks on your foes! You can even cash in on health potions if you feel like you're about to go under, but can you make it to the shop before running out of health, or will you have to put money down to make it there?!

Developed by - Joshua R. Kerr

Music - Free Licenced YouTube Audio Library Tracks, NOT Original

Development Time: Like, eight hours, over four days.

Why?: I wanted to finish a game, no matter how small or broken. This is only my first step towards getting to be a better developer after all, and I'm typing this out just as my time alloted reaches its end.
